my-parents: I'm attached to my parents' tax household

tenant.identity-card: Please be sure to add your double-sided document.
tenant.passport: Please add the second and third page of your passport.
tenant.permit: Please be sure to add your double-sided document.

cotenant.alternation: I add their current, complete, and signed alternation contract.
cotenant.cdd:
I add their current, complete, and signed employment contract.
And if they don't have an employment contract? You can attach a signed and dated attestation from their employer, dated within the last 3 months.
cotenant.cdi:
I add their current, complete, and signed employment contract.
And if they don't have an employment contract? You can attach a signed and dated attestation from their employer, dated within the last 3 months.
cotenant.cdi-trial:
I add their current, complete, and signed employment contract.
And if they don't have an employment contract? You can attach a signed and dated attestation from their employer, dated within the last 3 months.
cotenant.ctt:
I add their current, complete, and signed employment contract.
And if they don't have an employment contract? You can attach a signed and dated attestation from their employer, dated within the last 3 months.
cotenant.guarantor_salary: I add a payslip from their guarantor dated within the last 3 months, an attestation from their employer, proof of internship allowance payment, financial statements, or a tax notice in their name, complete and dated within the last 2 years.
cotenant.guest:
Please add 3 documents:
  • a signed letter of accommodation for free (we recommend using the template available on the service-public.fr website)
  • a copy of the host's identification document
  • a proof of address of the host dated within the last 3 months: property tax notice, telephone bill, rent receipt, etc.
cotenant.guest-parents:
Please add 3 documents:
  • a signed letter of accommodation for free (we recommend using the template available on the service-public.fr website)
  • a copy of the parent's identification document
  • a proof of address of your parent dated within the last 3 months: property tax notice, telephone bill, rent receipt, etc.
cotenant.identity-card: Please make sure to add their ID card front and back.
cotenant.passport: Please make sure to add pages 2 and 3 of their passport, as the signature must be visible.
cotenant.permit: Please make sure to add their permit front and back.
cotenant.independent: I add their proof of independent professional activity based on their type of activity.
cotenant.internship: I add the complete and signed internship agreement from their guarantor.
cotenant.less-than-year: I have declared being in France for less than a year.
cotenant.my-name: I add a tax notice in their name.
cotenant.my-parents: They have declared being dependent on my parents' tax domicile.
cotenant.organism-guarantor: I add a certificate or visa issued by the organization guaranteeing for my spouse.
cotenant.other-tax: In order to improve their application, I explain below why I do not receive a tax notice. Their explanation will be added to my application:
cotenant.owner: I add a property tax notice dated within the last year.
cotenant.pension: I add a pension statement, pension attestation, or a tax notice showing the names and pension income.
cotenant.rent: I add proof of rent payment or a tax notice showing the names and rental income.
cotenant.retired: I add a retirement pension statement. And if they don't have one? You can attach their most recent complete tax notice dated within the last 2 years.
cotenant.salary: I add their three most recent pay stubs or proof of internship allowance, or their two most recent financial statements (for self-employed individuals).
cotenant.scholarship: I add a scholarship award letter.
cotenant.social-service: I add proof of social benefits payment (ARE, CAF, Crous...) from their guarantor dated within the last 3 months, proof of benefit entitlement, or an attestation of housing assistance simulation.
cotenant.student: I add a copy of their student ID card or a certificate of enrollment for the current year.
cotenant.tenant: I add their rent receipts for the last three months.
cotenant.unemployed: I add a proof of entitlement to ARE or an employment situation statement from P√¥le Emploi dated within the last 3 months.

coupleinformationhelp.paragraph1: By entering your spouse's email address, they will be invited to contribute to the shared application file. They can register with their own credentials, and will be able to add, modify or delete the documents (both yours and theirs).
coupleinformationhelp.paragraph2: Note that your documents and your spouse's will be verified separately by DossierFacile. However, the shared file will be valid only when both sets of documents are approuved by DossierFacile. You will then have access to a link to share the application file.
coupleinformationhelp.paragraph3: Your spouse will receive an mail invite and must validate it within 48 hours. They will need to click on the link and choose a password, then they will have access to your shared file.

coupleinformation.acceptAuthor: J‚Äôaccepte que mon partenaire ait acc√®s √† mes documents ainsi qu‚Äô√† ceux de mon garant le cas √©ch√©ant une fois que nos deux dossiers auront √©t√© valid√©s

documenthelp.title: Help
documenthelp.paragraph1:
If your file is too heavy, we recommend that you scan your file (with a free smartphone app for example).
If that is not enough, contact us by email at contact@dossierfacile.fr, we will do our best to respond as quickly as possible!

guarantorchoicehelp.paragraph1:
A guarantor (or surety) is a natural or legal person who undertakes to the owner of the rented accommodation to pay the rental debts of the tenant.
More information on https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/vosdroits/F31267
guarantorchoicehelp.paragraph2: Certains organismes peuvent aussi constituer une garantie, obtenez gratuitement une garantie Visale sur www.visale.fr !
guarantorchoicehelp.paragraph3: Please note: you do not have to add a guarantor. However, some owners may require one.

guarantorchoice.corporation-identification: Identit√© du repr√©sentant de la personne morale
guarantorchoice.will-delete-guarantor: Are you sure you want to change the type of guarantor?
guarantorchoice.remark-text:
Adding a guarantor is by no means mandatory. If you do not wish to add a surety, you can select ‚ÄúI don't have a guarantor‚Äù.
Your file will then be registered for investigation.
guarantorchoice.visale-text: Visale is the guarantor of your future accommodation if you are between 18 and 30 years old OR if you are employees over 30 years old (subject to conditions).

nameinformationhelp.title: Help
nameinformationhelp.paragraph1: Attention, please fill in the information and documents of the person whose name will be on the rental agreement.
nameinformationhelp.paragraph2: <b>Any request where the identity of the tenant is not correct will not be investigated.<b>
nameinformationhelp.paragraph3: Example 1: if you are a student but it is your parents who sign the lease and pay the rent , the information and documents requested are those of the parents. Example 2: If you help a person complete the form but they are the future tenant, the information and documents requested are those of the person you are helping.

roommatesinformationhelp.paragraph1: By entering your roommate's email address, she/he will be able to create her/his own file with her/his documents. Your two folders will be linked and your folder-link will be common.

roommatesinformationhelp.paragraph3: If your roommate has not been able to confirm her/his registration within 48 hours, then you will have to start over!

taxhelp.paragraph2:
If your file is too heavy, we recommend that you scan your file (with a free smartphone app for example).
If that is not enough, contact us by email at contact@dossierfacile.fr, we will do our best to respond as quickly as possible!

After examining your file, modifications are requested.

tenantpanel.instructional-time-text: Once the files are completed, they are taken care of on average in less than 24 hours by our team of operators.
tenantpanel.congratulations-text-1: In order to apply for the accommodation of your dreams, send your DossierFacile link, by email, SMS, etc. to owners, lessors‚Ä¶ of your choice. As a reminder, DossierFacile does not offer accommodation.

uploaddocuments.warning-need-residency-documents:
Are you sure you have submitted all the necessary documents here?

  • proof of address of the host dated within the last 3 months
